name: Saroeun CHHAB, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Chhab v. Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas

judges: Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Saroeun CHHAB, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 382
Saroeun CHHAB, Petitioner, v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT, Respondent.
No. 80 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 22, 2016.
